pullrequest.title: Proposal: Updating to Visual Studio 2017 and improving Windows CI

content.raw:
There is one problem that I hadn't anticipated when I merged this: old versions of ignition-math are now failing to compile on Windows. For example, the `ign-math3` branch:

* https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_math-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64/336

any quick ideas @mxgrey ?
